text: @Mike_Pence It is more apparent than ever that is BS!  You have all turned your noses to those dying of COVID19.  Pro-life my ass!  BTW.  tRump is working for Putin and the @GOP is letting him.  Both parties agree that he is doing wrong!  Wake the hell up!
